game.title: Sonic The Hedgehog - Triple Trouble (USA, Europe)

cheat.description: Solo > All Levels > Have All Objectives Completed

Solo > All Levels > Always Have 00:00 Time
Solo > All Levels > Enemies > Cannot Aim
Solo > All Levels > Enemies > Are Weak

Solo > Runway > Press L to Make The Plane Take Off

Solo > Runway, Surface 1 & Depot > Infinite Ammo

Solo > Archives, Cavern, Cradle, & Egypt > Infinite Ammo

P1 & P2 Mode > P1 > Weapon = 3 Bananas

Global > Bullets Penetrate Shields [INFO: Able to kill bot on Chicago level, etc.]
Global > Walk Through Doors [WARNING: Enemies will also be able to walk through doors]
Global > Human Players Move Faster [INFO: Forward movement for all human players is much faster; strafing is unaffected]
Global > Press L or R to Have X-Ray Scope > With Any Weapon
Global > Press L or R to Have X-Ray Scope > When Unarmed
Global > Lighting > Lights Always On [TODO: DOESN'T WORK?]
Global > Lighting > All Lights On At Full Brightness (Overrides Light Switch) [USAGE: Works best when enabled before beginning a level]
Carrington Institute > Able To Use & Take Weapons Out Of The Firing Range [WARNING: Must be enabled _before_ the agent selection menu appears]
Solo & Co-Op > P1 > Immune To Enemy Gunfire
Solo & Co-Op > P1 > Moon Jump (press B) [USAGE: Activate it when you are already in the air. (e.g., run down hills, steps). Then hold the B button to rise, and release to fall.]
Solo & Co-Op > P1 > Have All Weapons
Solo & Co-Op > P1 > Infinite Ammo, No Reloads > All Weapons > Left hand
Solo & Co-Op > P1 > Infinite Ammo, No Reloads > All Weapons > Right hand

Solo & Co-Op > P1 > Infinite Ammo > DY357 Magnum & DY357-LX
Solo & Co-Op > P1 > Infinite Ammo > CMPI50, Cyclone, Callisto NTG, RC-PI20, Laptop Gun, KLOI3I3, ZZT (9mm), DMC & RC-P45
Solo & Co-Op > P1 > Infinite Ammo > Dragon, K7 Avenger, AR34, SuperDragon (Rapid Fire), Sniper Rifle, K7 Special, AR53

game.title: Legend of Zelda, The - Ocarina of Time (USA) (Rev B)

cheat.description: Turn Giant's Knife Into Biggoron's Sword
C Left to Use Hammer [INFO: You will be able to use the Hammer when you are a kid, but you will not see it]
Gravity > L Button For Moon Jump
Gravity > Hover Boots Last While Holding L & R Buttons
Fly Mode Note: Hold the L Button to go as high as you want and let go to fall.
Hover Boots Last While Holding L & R
Have Big Key, Compass, And Map
Always Have The Lens Of Truth
Have Golden Gauntlet, Golden Scale, 50 Bomb Bag, And 30 Arrow Quiver
Have The Megaton Hammer Equiped To Left C Note: You can use this as Adult OR Young Link!
